reviews.review: Counter-Strike, также известная как Half-Life: Counter-Strike — многопользовательская компьютерная игра в жанре шутера от первого лица, разработанная и выпущенная для Microsoft Windows американской компанией Valve. Первоначально Counter-Strike представляла собой пользовательскую модификацию к игре Half-Life, разработанную энтузиастами Минем Ле и Джессом Клиффом в 1999 году; в дальнейшем Valve наняла обоих разработчиков на работу и приобрела у них права интеллектуальной собственности на игру, в 2000 году выпустив доработанную версию Counter-Strike уже как самостоятельную игру.

You know what? It is actually still highly enjoyable. Especially those gungame, surf or other fun servers. 1.6 is much more dynamic than GO and is more about pure aim and less tactic/strategy. So if you wanna have fun, I think 1.6 is even better than GO. Because you don`t care about ranks or skill levels here. You don`t think through your every move or trying to remember a sick pop flash or smoke. You just have fun and enjoy your time. I mean, there are community maps and servers in cs go, but I don`t feel the same way as in 1.6 when I play there. I can somehow feel that GO is restricting me to do something, while 1.6 lets me do anything. Like blindly rush somewhere, or bhop all around the map on multi-leveled maps.

P.S. maybe I am a weirdo or just feeling nostalgic, but maps here are somehow more... I don`t know... Interesting or even weirdly beautiful? Maybe because they are less restrained in their concepts since the graphics is nowhere near realistic. While CS GO is still trying to be realistic. Like, you know, in 1.6 I just run into a server with a map, that has straight columns of water and everyone can jump in there and swim up to the sky almost. I also remember a map, where Ts are being launched into the air with some cannons and CTs are locked in a small building with awps, trying to shoot down Ts while they are flying all around in the sky :D. You won`t find this stuff in CS GO. Even on minigames or fun servers.

I've played this game twice, once alone and once with a squad of friends and enjoyed both
-Big open world with tons of weapons and different types of compounds and military bases that you can plan and approach as you see fit.
-Story is not that fresh but decent
-Sync shot is probably my favorite feature in this game.
-Overall enjoyable

Určitě doporučuji stále to hraje mnoho lidí. Je to nejlepší střílečka svých dob a nejspíš snad celého milénia.
Můžete si vybrat ze stovky či tisíců serverů různých módů od proslulého jailbreaku, zombíky, Hns, Deathrun a mnoho dalších dle vlastní chuti. 
Pokud vám mohu doporučit asi nejlepší české portály tak bych volil servery na Gamesites.cz a csko.cz.
Při této hře jsem strávil nespočet času a tak vám můžu zaručit, že pokud jste milovníkem tzv. OLD SCHOOL stříleček tohle si musíte zkusit.

-

骨灰级玩家，不解释，直接好评，CS系列我是从2003年开始跟我的童年伙伴一起玩的，当时是CS 1.0版本，后来逐渐是1.3，1.4，1.5到1.6再到后来的零点行动，起源，乃至csgo，一直在坚持，玩这么老的游戏只为最初的那份童年时光， 感谢那些年在网吧陪我在这款游戏中度过快乐时光的那群朋友，虽然早已经失去联系。永远的经典，安装只要2分钟，但值得用一生去精通！
